required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Open-labelled Clinical Trial of Live Attenuated Varicella Vaccines to Evaluate the Immunity Persistence After Primary Immunization and Safety and Immunogenicity After the Booster Immunization
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-labelled Clinical Trial,to Evaluate the Immunity Persistence of the Single-dose Primary Immunization of Live Attenuated Varicella Vaccine on Different Time Points,and the Safety and Immunogenicity After the Booster Immunization

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-labelled clinical trial of live attenuated varicella vaccines manufactured by Sinovac (Dalian) Vaccine Technology Co., Ltd .The purpose of this study is to evaluate the immunity persistence of the single-dose primary immunization of live attenuated varicella vaccine on different time points ,and the safety and immunogenicity after the booster immunization

detailed_description.textblock: This study is an open-labelled phase Ⅲ clinical trial.The experimental vaccine manufactured by Sinovac(Dalian) Vaccine Technology Co., Ltd.A total of 1195 subjects who received vaccine in the phase Ⅲ lot-consistency clinical trial were be enrolled .All subjects except C0243 and C0556 were divided into 3 groups according to the order of study number.Subjects in 3 groups received a booster immunization of live attenuated varicella vaccines 1 year,2 years and 3 years after primary immunization,respectively.About 3.0ml of venous blood was collected from each enrolled subject at pre-booster immunization,30 days after booster immunization and the serum was separated for neutralizing antibody detection.The antibody levels were used to evaluate the immunity persistence and immunogenicity after booster immunization of live attenuated varicella vaccines .

primary_outcome.description: seroconversion rates of antibody 1 year after primary immunization
seroconversion rates of antibody 2 years after primary immunization
seroconversion rates of antibody 3 years after primary immunization
Seroconversion rate of the neutralizing antibody 30 days after booster immunization
Seropositivity rate of antibody 30 days after booster immunization

secondary_outcome.description: Seropositivity rate of antibody before booster immunization
GMT of the antibody before booster immunization

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity index- GMT of the antibody
secondary_outcome.description: GMT of the antibody 30 days after booster immunization

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity index- GMI of the antibody
secondary_outcome.description: GMI of the antibody 30 days after booster immunization

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety index-Incidence of solicited local or systemic AE
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of solicited local or systemic AE within 14 days after vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety index-Incidence of local or systemic AE
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of local or systemic AE within 30 days after vaccination
Incidence of SAE within 30 days after vaccination

arm_group.arm_group_label: Booster immunization 1 year after primary immunization
arm_group.description: Subjects C0001-C0400 except C0243 received 1 dose of booster immunization 1 year after primary immunization.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Booster immunization 2 year after primary immunization
arm_group.description: Subjects C0401-C0800 except C0556 received 1 dose of booster immunization 2 years after primary immunization.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Booster immunization 3 year after primary immunization
arm_group.description: Subjects C0801-C1197 received 1 dose of booster immunization 3 years after primary immunization.

intervention.description: The investigational vaccine was manufactured by Sinovac (Dalian) Vaccine Technology Co., Ltd.And the live varicella-zoster virus in 0·5 mL of sucrose, sodium glutamate,sodium chloride,potassium chloride,sodium dihydrogen phosphate, potassium dihydrogen phosphate and injection water per injection
intervention.arm_group_label: Booster immunization 1 year after primary immunization
Booster immunization 2 year after primary immunization
Booster immunization 3 year after primary immunization

overall_official.affiliation: Henan Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention
